name: Chaos and Peace
description:
Your thrilling journey begins now!
It is a new idle RPG that puts you in the middle of the chaos world as you travel with your partners to resolve the crisis and save the world! Will you return in triumph to the adoration of the crowd, or will you retreat and be despised? It all depends on your choice!

=Play games anytime, anywhere=
Free your hands and upgrade to gain valuable resources. Conquer this world with ease!
